channel.title: Home?
channel.description:
Does anyone have any good ideas for a good home, Im willing to give credits on the server and if i release it on the forums.
What does the home need to have?
[ul][li]well it needs to be a decent size, i dont want a small place where the shops have to be cramped[/li] [li]I dont want a home thats on like 2000 other server. That means no edge, varrock, falador, or anything like that.[/li] [li]I dont necessarily need the coords, but if you want to give them that would help.[/li][/ul]
Thanks, Dman10345 ;D

item.title: Home?
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

u got any coords for the slave camp? i cant seem to find any

Read full topic

item.title: Home?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

ChaosPkers:

Desert slave camp is the one I’ve used for a while, just remove 2 or 3 rocks and it’s big, and inclosed already. Add your bank booths up against the building there, and design it how you want.

Thats sexeh. I might use that for my next source.

I’d use Neitiznot or Brimhaven.

Read full topic
